skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have honed my skills in front end development while working on various projects that demanded both creativity and technical proficiency. My toolkit encompasses HTML, CSS3, JavaScript, and popular front-end frameworks such as React.js.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I possess strong proficiency in backend development, particularly in Python and the Flask framework.My experience with Flask includes creating RESTful APIs, handling database interactions, and crafting clean and maintainable code.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I excel in UI/UX design, leveraging platforms like Figma and Canva to craft visually engaging and user-centric interfaces. My proficiency in these tools allows me to swiftly translate concepts into polished prototypes and high-fidelity mockups

skills.title: Bubble.IO
skills.description: I am proficient in using Bubble.io to create dynamic and responsive web applications without the need for traditional coding. My skills include designing visually appealing user interfaces, and integrating various APIs seamlessly within the Bubble.io platform.

portfolio.title: Remind Helper
portfolio.description: Remind Helper provides an automatic telephone call reminder service that is proven to significantly increase the likelihood of patients taking their medicine as prescribed by their doctors
